ModMetaData.name: Roofless hull for SOS2
ModMetaData.author: MrGlasses and Novatrium
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new hull for Save Our Ship 2 called Hangar Plating
This hull will create a breathable, roofless environment that keeps the room at a steady 21°C (70°F) while powered
This allows ships to take off and land in the area without breaking the roof
Original 1.3 mod by MrGlasses, updated and continued by Novatrium
